recommendations.item: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa & Steamed Vegetables
recommendations.reason: High in protein, healthy fats (omega-3s), and fiber. Balanced macros and moderate calories.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request light oil or lemon dressing instead of butter.

recommendations.reason: Lean protein, healthy fats, and whole grains provide sustained energy without excess calories.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Skip mayo or opt for mustard; add extra veggies.

recommendations.item: Buddha Bowl (Greens, Chickpeas, Sweet Potato, Tahini)
recommendations.reason: Plant-based protein, complex carbs, and nutrient-dense ingredients for a balanced meal.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Ask for tahini on the side to control portion.

items_to_avoid.item: Deep-Fried Appetizers (e.g., Mozzarella Sticks, Onion Rings)
items_to_avoid.reason: High in empty calories, unhealthy fats, and low nutritional value.
Excess refined carbs and saturated fats disrupt balance and calorie goals.
Added sugars spike blood sugar and provide little satiety.
